attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my boy is 4 years old and he has no school too go to because there is no place for him to go to because the education board they say he is not in that area,my other too boys go too that school but they rather send him 4 miles away which is further away and there is places in the school because the head teacher said there is which i dont think is right what do you say about that the school in question is the vine school in cambourne.

rejection.details:
As a personal case, this should be directed to the Department for Children, Schools and Families:
http://www.dcsf.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
